org.vast.data

Class EncodedValuesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opengis.OgcPropertyImpl<Object>
      • org.vast.data.EncodedValuesImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OgcProperty<Object>, EncodedValues, IXlinkReference<Object>

    public class EncodedValuesImpl
extends OgcPropertyImpl<Object>
implements EncodedValues

    Full implementation of EncodedValues wrapping SWE Common data stream parsers/writers allowing decoding/encoding of any encoded array or stream

    Since:
    Oct 3, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin
